name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a forest green box body and sleek cat-like arms and legs, Volt is equipped with a broken screen and stylish shades as an addon. Despite its screen being broken, Volt compensates with incredible abilities in other areas. It has a charismatic and charming personality, making it an excellent communicator. With its durable construction and powerful limbs, Volt possesses great strength and constitution. Additionally, Volt is highly intelligent and possesses a keen sense of dexterity. Its wisdom and skills in navigating through the forest make it a valuable asset to the club. Overall, Volt is a resilient and resourceful robot, always ready for any challenge that comes its way.
